CEX_NO_STREAM_FOUND: No radio station with ID %key% found
CEX_NO_PERMISSION: You don't have permission to access this resource
CEX_NO_USER_BY_LOGIN: User with login %login% does not exist
CEX_TRACK_FILE_NULL: Track with ID %id% is not exists on any file servers
CEX_CODE_INCORRECT: Entered security code is not correct
CEX_CODE_NOT_ACTUAL: Entered security code is not actual
VALIDATOR_NO_COUNTRY: Country with ID %0% does not exist
VALIDATOR_PASSWORD_LENGTH: Password length must be between %0% and %1% chars
VALIDATOR_STREAM_NAME_SHORT: Stream name must contain at least 3 chars
VALIDATOR_STREAM_WORDS: Stream name contains words that can not be used
VALIDATOR_LOGIN_LENGTH: Login length must be between %0% and %1% chars
VALIDATOR_LOGIN_CHARS: Login must contain only [a-z, 0-9 or "_"] chars
VALIDATOR_PERMALINK_EMPTY: Permalink couldn't be an empty string
VALIDATOR_PERMALINK_CHARS: Permalink must contain only [a-z, 0-9 or "-"] chars
VALIDATOR_USER_NAME_LENGTH: User name cannot be longer than %0% chars
VALIDATOR_CODE_MATCH: Entered code does not match the email
VALIDATOR_IMAGE_MIME: File %0% is not valid image file
FS_DOES_NOT_EXIST: File server with ID %id% does not exist
FS_NO_FREE_SPACE: There is no servers available for upload %amount% bytes of data
EMAIL_QUEUE_FULL: Sorry, but too many letters has been sent from your address. Wait for one hour and try again.
UPLOAD_NO_SPACE: You are exceeded available upload time. Please upgrade your account.
UPLOAD_NO_SERVERS: No available servers for uploading file %0%. This incident will be resolved soon.
FR_WELCOME_MESSAGE:
Create your own web radio station
or discover existing.
FR_CLICK_TO_BROWSE: Click here to browse existing streams
FR_PLAYER_COPY_TRACK: Copy this track to my account
FR_SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Search station by name or genre...
FR_OR_LOGIN_SOCIAL: or use social network to login
FR_OR_SIGN_UP_SOCIAL: or use social network to sign up
FR_FOUND_RESULTS: Here what we found based on your search request:
FR_NOTHING_FOUND: Nothing found for request %0%. Check the spelling, or try a different search.
FR_COUNT_USERS_LISTENING: %0% user(s) is listening to this radio channel
FR_STREAM_NO_ACCESS: Sorry, but this channel is down or you have no access to listen it.
FR_BROWSE_CHANNELS_DESCRIPTION: Browse radio stations which are up and streaming now on MyOwnRadio
FR_NO_STREAMS_CREATE_NEW: No streams found here. May be you want to create your own?
FR_REG_COMPLETED_TEXT:
You are successfully registered on MyOwnRadio.
Now you can proceed to login into service!
FR_REG_LETTER_SENT:
We sent to your email address a letter with further steps to continue registration.
Please check your mailbox in a few minutes for letter and follow confirmation link in it.
FR_PASSWORD_RESET_SENT:
We sent to your email address a letter with further steps to reset your password.
Please check your mailbox for letter and follow confirmation link in it.
FR_PASSWORD_SUCCESS: You're successfully changed your password. Now you can proceed to login with your new credentials.
FR_HOW_TO_RESET_PASSWORD: Tell us your login or email address and we'll send you instructions on how to reset your password.
FR_CHANGE_PASSWORD_HINT: If you forget your existing password here you can change it to another one. Please enter new password for your account.
FR_SIGN_UP_WELCOME: To begin registration on MyOwnRadio please enter your email in to the field below:
FR_SIGN_UP_COMPLETE_WELCOME: To complete registration please fill the following fields:
